import re

def get_even_characters(string):
    regex = ''
    matches = re.findall(regex, string)
    result = ''.join([matches[i] for i in range(len(matches)) if i % 2 == 0])
    return result

mutants.original_line: result = "".join([matches[i] for i in range(len(matches)) if i % 2 == 0])
mutants.mutated_line: result = 'MUTATED'.join([matches[i] for i in range(len(matches)) if i % 2 == 0])

import re

def get_even_characters(string):
    regex = '[a-zA-Z]'
    matches = re.findall(regex, string)
    result = 'MUTATED'.join([matches[i] for i in range(len(matches)) if i % 2 == 0])
    return result
